current_company.title: Talent Acquisition Specialist @The Reliable Jobs | Web3 Talent Acquisition

experience.title: Human Resources Coordinator
experience.description: Leading and coordinating recruitment processes, including job postings, candidate sourcing and screening, interviews, offer negotiations and staffing.Acting as the point of contact between candidates, managers and recruiters.Managing employee onboarding, including orientation, benefits setup, and training assignments.Overseeing employee management, focusing on performance appraisals, conflict resolution, and compliance.Administering benefits and compensation programs, including salary structures and incentive plans.Promoting employee engagement through surveys, recognition programs, and wellness initiatives.Ensuring compliance and managing risk, including policy development and dispute resolution.
experience.description_html: Leading and coordinating recruitment processes, including job postings, candidate sourcing and screening, interviews, offer negotiations and staffing.Acting as the point of contact between candidates, managers and recruiters.Managing employee onboarding, including orientation, benefits setup, and training assignments.Overseeing employee management, focusing on performance appraisals, conflict resolution, and compliance.Administering benefits and compensation programs, including salary structures and incentive plans.Promoting employee engagement through surveys, recognition programs, and wellness initiatives.Ensuring compliance and managing risk, including policy development and dispute resolution.

experience.title: Talent Sourcer
experience.description: Proactively sourced, screened, and submitted candidates using job boards, Boolean searches and networks.Specialized in diversity sourcing for various verticals including Advisory, Audit, IT, Non-IT, Finance, and Healthcare.Sourced for APAC, EMEA, NAMER, LATAM region.Managed daily candidate data tracking in the ATS.Collaborated with recruitment partners to understand roles, requirements, and client expectations.Provided regular updates to partners and clients on work status and progress.
experience.description_html: Proactively sourced, screened, and submitted candidates using job boards, Boolean searches and networks.Specialized in diversity sourcing for various verticals including Advisory, Audit, IT, Non-IT, Finance, and Healthcare.Sourced for APAC, EMEA, NAMER, LATAM region.Managed daily candidate data tracking in the ATS.Collaborated with recruitment partners to understand roles, requirements, and client expectations.Provided regular updates to partners and clients on work status and progress.
